paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for KCNH2, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The origin of these three lines was confirmed by short tandem repeat (STR) analysis which demonstrated that the line profiles completely overlapped with those of the donor somatic cells.

functional_data.summary: The iPSC lines generated from patients carrying pathogenic variants provide a resource for investigating inherited arrhythmia syndromes.

variants.additional_notes: This variant is associated with a high risk of LQT2.
key_quotes: KCNH2 mutations that cause loss of Kv11.1 channel function which can lead to arrhythmias, syncope, and sudden death.
Here, we report three iPSC lines from patients carrying pathogenic variants (c.1714G > A; c.2960del) or a variant of uncertain significance (c.1870A > T) in the KCNH2 gene.
